name: Issues Action Tracker
query:
select
i.name as "Serial No:Link/Issue",
c.content as "Comment",
i.opening_date as "Date:Date",
i.source_of_input as "Source Of Input",
i.issue_type as "Nature of Concern",
i.category_of_concern as "Category of Concern",
i.subject as "Type of Issue",
i.send_gift_hamper as "Required Gift",
i.description as "Initial remarks on customer call",
i.phone_no as "Caller Contact No",
i.no_of_calls_by_customer as "No of Calls By Customer",
i.status as "Status",
i.no_of_call_back_attempted as "No of Call back Attempted",
i.call_back_date as "Call Back Date:Date",
i.caller_name as "Verified Caller Name",
i.state as "Verified Caller State",
i.address as "Verified Caller Address",
t.assigned_by_full_name as "Assigned By",
t.date as "Assigned Date:Date",
t.owner as "Allocated To:100"
from `tabIssue` i left join `tabToDo` t on i.name = t.reference_name 
left join `tabComment` c on i.name = c.reference_name and c.comment_type="Comment"
where (date(i.opening_date) between %(from_date)s and %(to_date)s) and i.issue_type=%(issue_type)s 
order by i.name asc;
